MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the DG8 postcode area of Whithorn, this is also affecting the surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of power issues in the area and only became aware of it at 5.05pm. Our engineers are on their way to Kevans substation and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 8pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5.27pm on Friday 13th November 2020.
